doc.title: Living Proof: HIV and the Pursuit of Happiness
doc.plot: Documentary about living with AIDS. This "positive" film deals with how folks are living with the virus. The film makers interviewed over 30 folks from different backgrounds and different walks of life who were already particpating in a photo study about the subject. The film makers then attended the opening of the photo exhibit at the World Trade Center. To round out the film they also talked to people outside the New York City area including an HIV-positive policeman from Chicago and an an HIV-positive Eagle Scout from Washington, DC.
